scenes.summary: Artie argues with a vending machine over a bag of chips before a freak electrical surge sends him to the character creation void.

scenes.outcome: Artie realizes that in this world, '1 HP' means a stiff breeze could kill him.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie tries to punch the slime; he misses repeatedly before landing a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporizes the monster and the environment behind it.

scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
